ygData.subject: RE: Factions..
ygData.msgSnippet: Kaladim: Kill goblins in butcher, aqua goblins, do the Muffins for Pandros quest with about 2000 muffins (yes 2000), do Pirate Earrings quest and Pirate
ygData.messageBody:
Kaladim:
Kill goblins in butcher, aqua goblins, do the "Muffins for Pandros" quest
with about 2000 muffins (yes 2000), do "Pirate Earrings" quest and "Pirate
Bracers" quest, and finally do "Ogre Heads" quest in kaladim itself.

You have two strikes against you. 1) religion (for some odd reason all NPCs
instantly know your religion regardless of your illusion) 2) race (dwarves,
high elves, wood elves, gnomes, barbarians, and some humans are all KOS to
you). You will have to raise your faction as high as it can go with the
stormguard before your illusions will work (due to your religion).

Crushbone:
There is a very convoluted way to get the free faction by doing crushbone.
You kill stuff in crushbone. You take the hits with the Indigo Brotherhood.
You turn in orc picks to gain that faction back but lose it with
stormguard(dwarves) and emerald warriors(wood elves). You then go and kill
aqua goblins in oot to gain back the stormguard and emerald warriors. Whew.
Long complex way, but in the end you will get positives in everything.

Athos
40th DEA Enchanter Karana

-----Original Message-----
From: Jenni [mailto:freya@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 1999 11:49 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Factions..


From: Jenni <freya@...>

Hey all!

Another question. :) Is there a way to raise your faction with the
Ogguk Guards, Merchants, and/or Clurg? Say you're KOS there, and are
not an enchanter so you can't cast an illusion. Is it at all possible?
I've checked every everquest website that I know of for the faction hits
for the various monsters and I don't see anything about raising or
lowering faction with these groups.

Also, I'm KOS in Kaladim with or without illusions, and Alliance doesn't
help. Anything I can/should do to raise faction with them as well? I
wasn't able to find a whole lot about the Kaladim Guards. What group do
they belong to?

Last but not least: this is for any DE enchanters out there.
Crushbone: Should I or shouldn't I? The only faction I will lose is
with the Warriors Guild in Neriak (Indigo Brotherhood), and I will gain
a lot of faction where I'm currently KOS. BUT I don't necessairly want
to make myself KOS in my own hometown either.. comments?

By the way, I'm not agnostic. Makes things a bit tougher, but that's
what keeps the game fun. :)

Ezrae
14th Level Dark Elf Enchanter
Brell Serilis
